function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","Impact":"Ineffective management during a pandemic, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Strengthening public health systems and implementing population-wide approaches","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, data analytics for public health monitoring","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Shortages of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among healthcare workers and the general public","Mitigation":"Building stockpiles of PPE, diversifying supply chains, increasing local production","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, 3D printing for PPE manufacturing","People":"Healthcare workers, essential workers, general public","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Dependence on imports for vital equipment","Impact":"Difficulty in securing vital equipment during a pandemic, leading to increased risk for healthcare workers and the general public","Mitigation":"Developing local production capacity, diversifying sourcing, building strategic stockpiles","Technologies":"Advanced manufacturing technologies, supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, essential workers, general public","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, manufacturers"}]}
